cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI. 

The paper deals with erasure codes and distributed storage systems, which are topics related to information theory (cs.IT) and data structures (cs.DS). The concept of repair locality is also relevant to distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SI). Additionally, the paper discusses the minimum distance of linear codes, which is a topic in network information theory (cs.NI).
